name: Rally X
overview: A maze, chase and race game all in one! Welcome to a uniquely different kind of driving game that requires skillful strategy and quick reactions. Locate all the checkpoint flags in the field using your trusty radar, and collect them one by one as fast as you can to conserve fuel, while avoiding collision with the chaser cars. You can stun the chasers with smoke screens, but they won't stay down for long! Also look out for boulders that block you path. Relive the excitement of this classic arcade game on your ColecoVision!
